answers.answer: My wife was getting headaches every day there for a while. The doctor prescribed hey escheck or something like that and it worked of she took it as soon as the headache started.
I have been getting headaches too and I tske excedrin tension headache, it has no aspirin in it. My doctor told me it's safe to take, just not everyday. It has Tylenol and caffeine only. Feel better!
Thank you guys I'm gonna talk to my dr cuz this is too much I try drink warm Tea too. And I'm gonna try em to.

I have had headaches none stop for a week. Am 27 weeks and the nurses have given me Tylenol every evening. Not working, I also got ice pack. Until last night one of them gave me aromatherapy nose inhaler. I used the lavender one and it helped. Maybe you can try that.

I've always had chronic migraines and I am even more limited than the average pregnant woman with what I can take because of a neurological disorder. When my migraines started to get worse around 20 weeks my Dr wanted me to try increasing my protein intake before we tried any medications so I started eating more greek yogurt, made a great apple dip out of plain greek yogurt, peanut butter, and cinnamon and snacked on that with apples.... it helped a ton and he also gave me the ok to have 1 cup of coffee in the morning to help keep them at bay as well.
When I was 23 and 24 weeks I had crazy headaches where I had to black out my windows and sleep nothing helped finally it started to go away
thank you ladies but this is so bad I even change my windows curtains so it could be a dark and I'm trying to limit my medication like Taking Tylenol. But I hope it go away.  Good luck ladies! !
acupuncture, massage and chiropractic care helped me.  staying hydrated also important. good luck
Headaches can often be a sign of preeclampsia. I would talk to your doctor.

question: oh my gosh I have a headache daily basis  on  I'm 23 weeks on Monday And Tylenol doesn't  help me did you guys know anything else I can take & safe for the baby?? :(
title: is anyone else experiencing bad  headache??
